INSERT INTO TSJX_USER ( ID, USER_NAME, MOBILE, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, PASSWORD, QQ, PROVINCE_NAME, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_NAME, CITY_ID, BUSINESS_SCOPE, BUSINESS_NATURE, USER_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, SRC, IS_ACTIVATE, IS_NEW_MESSAGE, HEAD_ICON, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, DELETED, REAL_NAME, WEIXIN_ACCOUNT ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActivate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNewMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixinAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_TSJX_USER.nextval as id FROM dual
